Заказы AliExpress теперь можно забрать в «Пятерочке», «Перекрестке» и «Карусели»
02 Nov 2019, 12:21 by Мария Касай
AliExpress запустил доставку заказов в магазины «Пятерочка», «Перекресток» и «Карусель». Все они входят в группу X5, которая стала логистической компанией для китайского маркетплейса.
Сейчас у нее более 15,7 тысячи магазинов, а в 5,7 из них уже работает доставка AliExpress. Забрать посылку можно в постамате или на кассе, где она будет храниться в сейфе. Чтобы ее получить, нужно предъявить кассиру паспорт и назвать номер заказа.
Два года назад X5 начала «цифровую трансформацию». Сотрудничество с AliExpress стало одним из направлений. В будущем группа планирует работать и с другими интернет-магазинами.

источник: «Ведомости»

Russian youth was advised not to spend more than three hours a day on gadgets
02 Nov 2019, 12:31 by Alexey Gromov

According to the specialists of RNIMU them. Pirogov and the Northern State Medical University, modern youth should spend no more than three hours a day on the use of gadgets. Otherwise, there is a risk of various diseases.

Specialists RNIMU them. Pirogov and Northern State Medical University found that the maximum safe time that young people can spend on a computer and other gadgets is no more than three hours a day. About this writes RT, who got acquainted with the results of the study.
So, experts recommend that schoolchildren and students spend up to three hours a day on smartphones and laptops, as those who spend more time on gadgets have an increased risk of developing physical abnormalities.
In addition, among the possible health problems, researchers called myopia, mental and neurological abnormalities and disorders of the musculoskeletal system. Also, frequent use of devices with headphones can increase the likelihood of hearing problems.
Experts said that because of the enthusiasm for gadgets, modern youth devotes less time to sleep, walking and sports. For example, students spend on sleep 9% less time, and on walks and sports - 6%. Students spend 7% less time on sleep, and 4% on walks and sports. It is noted that the study involved 465 high school students (16 years old) and 598 students (20 years old) from three regions of Russia.
Earlier NEVSKY NEWS wrote that experts talked about a problem that could turn a smartphone into a sound weapon of vulnerability.
